MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 3:37pm in the LL20 postcode area of Llangollen following reports of a grounded overhead line. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely possible by 5:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:40pm on 30th January 2021.
